title: TETRIS THE GRAND MASTER 4 -ABSOLUTE EYE-
description:
Originally debuting in arcades in August 1998, the puzzle game “TETRIS® THE GRAND MASTER” quickly captured the hearts of gamers with its addictive and engaging take on the classic Tetris formula. This beloved title paved the way for further installments, including “TETRIS THE ABSOLUTE THE GRAND MASTER 2” in 2000 and “TETRIS THE GRAND MASTER 3 -Terror Instinct-” in 2005. Now, after two decades, the latest evolution of the series, “TETRIS THE GRAND MASTER 4 -ABSOLUTE EYE-“, is making its long-awaited debut on Steam.
This new iteration, “TGM4,” promises to deliver an even more profound and strategically rich Tetris experience, offering a depth of gameplay that will challenge and satisfy even the most seasoned Tetris veterans. A host of brand-new modes have been introduced, designed to push players’ skills to their absolute limits, demanding both precise strategic thinking and lightning-fast execution. However, the game also caters to newcomers, featuring accessible modes that allow even those unfamiliar with Tetris to jump in and enjoy its inherent charm, ensuring countless replay sessions. Koira
Adding to the immersive experience is the captivating soundtrack crafted by the renowned Shinji Hosoe, a composer well-known for his iconic work on the previous TGM titles. His music, brimming with tension and excitement, is designed to heighten the player’s focus and amplify the thrill of each falling tetromino. Furthermore, players will have the opportunity to engage in competitive local multiplayer, adding another layer of excitement and replayability to this highly anticipated return of the Grand Master.
